Hero.title: I am a Web Developer and Frontend Engineer based in Brazil
Hero.description: For over 10 years combining design and programming to transform ideas into innovative digital products.

Features.title: About
Features.description: Learn a little more about me.

About.title: Hi!.My name is Renato Khael.
About.description: I've been working with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript since 2010, and for the past 5 years, I've specialized in React, Vue.js, and TypeScript. This experience allows me to integrate design and development, creating high-performance and scalable user-focused applications.

Portfolio.title: Web Development and UX/UI Design Services
Portfolio.description: Meet my agency specializing in website development, landing pages, e-commerce. High standard UI design. Check out some of the projects I had the pleasure of developing.

Contact.title: contact
Contact.description: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me

AboutPage.title: Software engineer passionate about UX/UI Design
AboutPage.sub-title: Aprimorando a Navegação com Design Intuitivo
AboutPage.description: Software Engineer with a focus on Frontend and UX/UI, combining design skills with solid technical knowledge. With over 10 years of experience in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and more than 5 years working with React, Vue.js, and TypeScript, I am uniquely positioned to integrate design and development, creating high-performing and scalable user-focused applications.
